title: IBody2.OffsetPlanarWireBody
description: Offsets a planar wire body in the normal plane by the specified distance.
signature:
Body2 OffsetPlanarWireBody( 
   System.Double
Distance
,
   MathVector
Normal
,
   System.Int32
Option
)

parameters.name: Distance
parameters.description: Distance by which to offset the planar wire body

parameters.name: Option
parameters.description: How to fill the gap between edges as defined in swOffsetPlanarWireBodyOptions_e

remarks: The offset direction is determined by the direction of the first edge and the normal. For example, imagine that you are standing on the plane with normal pointing upwards and you are looking along the first edge, then the offset is to your right.
